name: Titan Evolution Party
description:
Up above the world so high, like a nightmare in the sky.
Titan's road to dominance thru evolution and mutation! From the perspective of titan, explore new views of titan world!

- Highly recommanded by Titan experts!

- Discuss how the titans develop

- Reprogram your emotion towards titans...

- Sublimate your personal taste!

- Why humans are common is that they can not overtake themselves
